title: How to Get Togepi in Pokémon Games

steps.title: Beat the first Gym Leader (Falkner).
steps.content: Beat the first Gym Leader (Falkner). Then, go to the Pokémon Centre. When you go there, talk to Prof. Elm's assistant. He will give you an egg which will hatch into Togepi! HeartGold/SoulSilver works the same way; just meet him in the Poké Mart instead.

steps.title: Go to the Water Labyrinth.
steps.content: Go to the Water Labyrinth. Make sure the Pokémon that is first in your party has high happiness. At the end of the Labyrinth, an old man should be there. Talk to him, and he will give you the egg!

steps.title: Beat the Elite 4.
steps.content: Beat the Elite 4. Then, go to Route 230 and use your Poké Radar. Go to the patches of grass that were moving.

steps.title: Beat the Eterna Gym Leader and Team Galactic's Jupiter.
steps.content: Beat the Eterna Gym Leader and Team Galactic's Jupiter. Then, go to the Bike Shop and talk to the Manager. For saving him from Team Galactic, he will reward you with a bike. When you come out of the shop, Cynthia will be there. Talk to her, and when she offers to give you the egg, say “Yes.”

steps.title: Finish the main storyline.
steps.content: Finish the main storyline. Then, use the Entralink to bring Miki over from Black City to your White Version. Go to White Forest and keep running back and forth in the tall grass until you find a Togepi.

steps.title: Ask a friend that has White for a Togepi.
steps.content: Ask a friend that has White for a Togepi. In return, make sure to give them an item from Black City that is rare and hard to find anywhere else.
